commentBody: This is so horrible that it leaves me speechless. There's so much hatred held inside these men that spews out into this weird anonymous sphere. Social media gives these mistaken, misguided, unhappy, violent people a forum and there has to be a way to discover who they are and make then stand publicly accused to acknowledge their own hate and meanness.  I'm glad these women are bringing it forward into the light.  It is brave of them.
